<a id='UnitRoot.dfgls_test' href='#UnitRoot.dfgls_test'>#</a>
**`UnitRoot.dfgls_test`** &mdash; *Function*.



Calculates dfgls point optimal unit-root test statistic of Elliott, Rothenberg, and Stock (1996) value of the largest autorregressive coefficient under the alternative hypothesis given by œÅ = 1+c/T, where c=-7 if trend="constant" and c=-13.5 if trend="linear")
